verses.roman:
pāriṣada-gaṇe dekhi' saba gopa-veśe
'kṛṣṇa' 'kṛṣṇa' kahe sabe saprema āveśe

synonyms: pāriṣada-gaṇe—associates; dekhi'-seeing; saba—all; gopa-veśe—in the dress of cowherd boys; kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa—Kṛṣṇa, Kṛṣṇa; kahe—says; sabe—all; sa-prema—of ecstatic love; āveśe—in absorption.
translation: His devotees, dressed like cowherd boys, surrounded His feet like so many bees and also chanted "Kṛṣṇa, Kṛṣṇa," absorbed in ecstatic love.
